name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Test Engineer with 8 years of experience in manual testing, test management, and defect tracking. Proficient in **Azure DevOps**, Agile methodologies, and Scrum practices, ensuring efficient test planning and execution. Adept at Computer System Validation and Computer Software Assurance, producing thorough test case designs that align with regulatory compliance. Proven ability to report and log bugs effectively, enhancing overall software quality in diverse sectors, particularly healthcare and finance.

Along with my strong testing foundation, I leverage my background as a Full Stack Developer, drawing from technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My expertise includes full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have experience in cloud solutions across **Azure** and **AWS**. My work has involved building enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML for predictive analytics, while ensuring robust application development in line with compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
